verses.verse: שְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> Keep [רַגְלֶיךָ כ] (רַגְלְךָ֗ <WH7272> be able to endure ק) כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you תֵּלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> to the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וְקָר֣וֹב <WH7138> and be more ready לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <WH8085> to hear מִתֵּ֥ת <WH5414> than to give הַכְּסִילִ֖ים <WH3684> of fools זָ֑בַח <WH2077> the sacrifice כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵינָ֥ם <WH369> for יוֹדְעִ֖ים <WH3045> for they consider לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> not that they do רָֽע׃ <WH7451> evil

אַל־ <WH408> be not תְּבַהֵ֨ל <WH926> Be not rash עַל־ <WH5921> in פִּ֜יךָ <WH6310> with thy mouth וְלִבְּךָ֧ <WH3820> and let not thine heart אַל־ <WH408> not יְמַהֵ֛ר <WH4116> be hasty לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> to utter דָבָ֖ר <WH1697> [any] thing לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God כִּ֣י <WH3588> For הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> for God בַּשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> [is] in heaven וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you עַל־ <WH5921> are on הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and thou upon earth עַֽל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> let דְבָרֶ֖יךָ <WH1697> therefore let thy words מְעַטִּֽים׃ <WH4592> be few

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for בָּ֥א <WH935> cometh הַחֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> For a dream בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> through the multitude עִנְיָ֑ן <WH6045> of business וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> voice כְּסִ֖יל <WH3684> and a fool's בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> [is known] by multitude דְּבָרִֽים׃ <WH1697> of words

כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> what תִּדֹּ֨ר <WH5087> When thou vowest נֶ֜דֶר <WH5088> a vow לֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> unto God אַל־ <WH408> not תְּאַחֵר֙ <WH309> defer לְשַׁלְּמ֔וֹ <WH7999> not to pay כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> no חֵ֖פֶץ <WH2656> it for [he hath] no pleasure בַּכְּסִילִ֑ים <WH3684> in fools אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what תִּדֹּ֖ר <WH5087> that which thou hast vowed שַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> pay

ט֖וֹב <WH2896> Better אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> you should not תִדֹּ֑ר <WH5087> [is it] that thou shouldest not vow מִשֶּׁתִּדּ֖וֹר <WH5087> than that thou shouldest vow וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not תְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> and not pay

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> Suffer אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH6310> not thy mouth לַחֲטִ֣יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרֶ֔ךָ <WH1320> to cause thy flesh וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֹּאמַר֙ <WH559> neither say לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> thou before הַמַּלְאָ֔ךְ <WH4397> the angel כִּ֥י <WH3588> that it was שְׁגָגָ֖ה <WH7684> that it [was] an error הִ֑יא <WH1931> he לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why יִקְצֹ֤ף <WH7107> be angry הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> wherefore should God עַל־ <WH5921> account קוֹלֶ֔ךָ <WH6963> at thy voice וְחִבֵּ֖ל <WH2254> and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3027> able

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Rather בְרֹ֤ב <WH7230> For in the multitude חֲלֹמוֹת֙ <WH2472> of dreams וַהֲבָלִ֔ים <WH1892> [there are] also [divers] vanities וּדְבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> words הַרְבֵּ֑ה <WH7235> and many כִּ֥י <WH3588> Rather אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> thou God יְרָֽא׃ <WH3372> but fear

אִם־ <WH518> If עֹ֣שֶׁק <WH6233> the oppression רָ֠שׁ <WH7326> of the poor וְגֵ֨זֶל <WH1499> and violent מִשְׁפָּ֤ט <WH4941> perverting of judgment וָצֶ֙דֶק֙ <WH6664> and justice תִּרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> If thou seest בַמְּדִינָ֔ה <WH4082> in a province אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְמַ֖הּ <WH8539> marvel עַל־ <WH5921> than they הַחֵ֑פֶץ <WH2656> not at the matter כִּ֣י <WH3588> one גָבֹ֜הַּ <WH1364> for [he that is] higher מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> over גָּבֹ֙הַּ֙ <WH1364> than the highest שֹׁמֵ֔ר <WH8104> regardeth וּגְבֹהִ֖ים <WH1364> and [there be] higher עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over

וְיִתְר֥וֹן <WH3504> Moreover the profit אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth בַּכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all [הִיא כ] (ה֑וּא <WH1931> he ק) מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> is for all the king לְשָׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> by the field נֶעֱבָֽד׃ <WH5647> [himself] is served

אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> He that loveth כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> silver לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִשְׂבַּ֣ע <WH7646> shall not be satisfied כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> with silver וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> who אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> nor he that loveth בֶּהָמ֖וֹן <WH1995> abundance לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תְבוּאָ֑ה <WH8393> with increase גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> this [is] also vanity

בִּרְבוֹת֙ <WH7235> increase הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> When goods רַבּ֖וּ <WH7235> increase אוֹכְלֶ֑יהָ <WH398> that eat וּמַה־ <WH4100> what כִּשְׁרוֹן֙ <WH3788> them and what good לִבְעָלֶ֔יהָ <WH1167> [is there] to the owners כִּ֖י <WH3588> thereof אִם־ <WH518> thereof saving [רְאִיַּת כ] (רְא֥וּת <WH7200> advise self ק) עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> affliction

מְתוּקָה֙ <WH4966> [is] sweet שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8142> The sleep הָעֹבֵ֔ד <WH5647> of a labouring man אִם־ <WH518> whether מְעַ֥ט <WH4592> little וְאִם־ <WH518> whether הַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> or much יֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> whether he eat וְהַשָּׂבָע֙ <WH7647> but the abundance לֶֽעָשִׁ֔יר <WH6223> of the rich אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <WH369> will not מַנִּ֥יחַֽ <WH3240> will not suffer ל֖וֹ לִישֽׁוֹן׃ <WH3462> him to sleep

יֵ֚שׁ <WH3426> There is רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> evil חוֹלָ֔ה <WH2470> a sore רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> [which] I have seen תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun עֹ֛שֶׁר <WH6239> [namely] riches שָׁמ֥וּר <WH8104> kept לִבְעָלָ֖יו <WH1167> for the owners לְרָעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH7451> thereof to their hurt

וְאָבַ֛ד <WH6> perish הָעֹ֥שֶׁר <WH6239> But those riches הַה֖וּא <WH1931> those בְּעִנְיַ֣ן <WH6045> travail רָ֑ע <WH7451> by evil וְהוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> and he begetteth בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand מְאֽוּמָה׃ <WH3972> and [there is] nothing

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> he יָצָא֙ <WH3318> As he came forth מִבֶּ֣טֶן <WH990> womb אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> of his mother's עָר֛וֹם <WH6174> naked יָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> shall he return לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> carry כְּשֶׁבָּ֑א <WH935> as he came וּמְא֙וּמָה֙ <WH3972> nothing לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> and shall take בַעֲמָל֔וֹ <WH5999> of his labour שֶׁיֹּלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> carry בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also זֹה֙ <WH2090> And this רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> evil חוֹלָ֔ה <WH2470> also [is] a sore כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> [that] in all points שֶׁבָּ֖א <WH935> as he came כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> thus יֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> die וּמַה־ <WH4100> what יִּתְר֣וֹן <WH3504> and what profit ל֔וֹ שֶֽׁיַּעֲמֹ֖ל <WH5998> hath he that hath laboured לָרֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> air

גַּ֥ם <WH1571> also כָּל־ <WH3605> Throughout יָמָ֖יו <WH3117> All his days בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness יֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> also he eateth וְכָעַ֥ס <WH3708> vexation הַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> and [he hath] much וְחָלְי֥וֹ <WH2483> with his sickness וָקָֽצֶף׃ <WH7110> and wrath

הִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> Here אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is what רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> Behold [that] which I have seen אָ֗נִי <WH589> I ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [it is] good אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָפֶ֣ה <WH3303> and comely לֶֽאֶכוֹל־ <WH398> [for one] to eat וְ֠לִשְׁתּוֹת <WH8354> and to drink וְלִרְא֨וֹת <WH7200> and to enjoy טוֹבָ֜ה <WH2896> the good בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲמָל֣וֹ ׀ <WH5999> of all his labour שֶׁיַּעֲמֹ֣ל <WH5998> that he taketh תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun מִסְפַּ֧ר <WH4557> all יְמֵי־ <WH3117> the days [חַיָּו כ] (חַיָּ֛יו <WH2416> age ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> giveth ל֥וֹ הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> which God כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֥וּא <WH1931> this חֶלְקֽוֹ׃ <WH2506> him for it [is] his portion

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Furthermore כָּֽל־ <WH3605> every הָאָדָ֡ם <WH120> Every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to whom נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> hath given ל֣וֹ הָאֱלֹהִים֩ <WH430> also to whom God עֹ֨שֶׁר <WH6239> riches וּנְכָסִ֜ים <WH5233> and wealth וְהִשְׁלִיט֨וֹ <WH7980> and hath given him power לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <WH398> to eat מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> and to וְלָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> thereof and to take אֶת־ <WH853> חֶלְק֔וֹ <WH2506> his portion וְלִשְׂמֹ֖חַ <WH8055> and to rejoice בַּעֲמָל֑וֹ <WH5999> in his labour זֹ֕ה <WH2090> this מַתַּ֥ת <WH4991> [is] the gift אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he

כִּ֚י <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> he will not הַרְבֵּ֔ה <WH7235> For he shall not much יִזְכֹּ֖ר <WH2142> remember אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days חַיָּ֑יו <WH2416> of his life כִּ֧י <WH3588> because הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> because God מַעֲנֶ֖ה <WH6031> answereth בְּשִׂמְחַ֥ת <WH8057> [him] in the joy לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> of his heart
